body.name: Arcade The Original Unisex Adventure Belt, Repreve Elastic Webbing, Non-Metal Travel Friendly Buckle
features: BUILT FOR MOVEMENT: The original good times belt. Made with non-metal buckles, heavy duty nylon, and natural elastic - the same material as your outdoor gear. These belts are designed specifically for active lifestyles providing superior freedom of movement and comfort

VERSATILE & CUSTOM FIT: On the move? Keep your dress belts at home. Our heavy duty Adventure Belt is lightweight, low-profile and comfortable which makes it ideal for hiking, biking, skateboarding, climbing, skiing/snowboarding and virtually any other activity. Its micro-adjustable buckle makes it a perfect one size fits all option, supporting up to a 40" waist

TRAVEL FRIENDLY: Whether navigating the slopes of Tahoe or the lines of airport security, we got you covered. A non-metal buckle means easier passage through TSA and a more comfortable journey to your destination

MACHINE WASHABLE: Thanks to being made of heavy duty nylon, these belts are conveniently machine washable. Simply leave your belt looped in a pair of pants for both the wash and dry cycles and it'll be clean in minutes

STRAP IN, VENTURE OUT: Arcade was founded on the belief that belts could be designed to function better, last longer and be more comfortable. Developed from the ground up with materials that are built to go everywhere and anywhere, each Arcade belt provides a custom fit, sturdy hold and the right amount of flexibility to move with you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The perfect belt for every adventure—the Adventure Belt stretches to match your moves and can handle years of use. It's light, low-profile, micro-adjustable, pinch-free, and comes in cool colors. What more could you want?

VERSATILE The lightweight, low-profile design makes Adventure Belts perfect for all adventures. Superior fit and ultimate comfort with durable and strong elastic stretch webbing. EASY CARE Adventure Belts are Washer/Dryer safe, which means you can leave your belt in your pants during the wash and dry cycles. FIT Thanks to the elastic stretch and micro-adjustable belt buckle, this belt has 'one size fits most' sizing (up to 40"). Adventure Belts have a width of 1.5". TRAVEL FRIENDLY No metal, no worries. The Adventure Belt is travel friendly and allows for easier passage through airport security

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Companion for the Adventurous Spirit - Five Stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Arcade Original Unisex Adventure Belt! This belt is a game-changer in the world of active, outdoor gear. Built for movement, it offers superior freedom and comfort like no other. It's constructed with heavy-duty nylon and natural elastic that provides an unparalleled fit and flexibility.Whether it's hiking, biking, skateboarding, or skiing, this belt can handle it all. I love that it has a low-profile, lightweight design, and the micro-adjustable buckle supports up to a 40" waist, providing an excellent, custom fit.Traveling is also a breeze with the non-metal buckle. Airport security is so much smoother now that I don't have to worry about metal detectors. Plus, it's machine-washable - a feature I didn't know I needed until I had it. Simply toss it in the wash with your pants, and it's clean in minutes!Arcade has truly outdone themselves by designing a belt that functions better, lasts longer, and provides unrivaled comfort. I can wholeheartedly say that this is the most reliable accessory I've ever had for my outdoor adventures. If you're an adventure enthusiast like me, do yourself a favor and get the Arcade Original Unisex Adventure Belt. It's an investment that you won't regret!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm not really a fan of "one size fits all" belts/hats/anything or belts that can be folded to customize the fit. I also did not want to spend $30+ on a "recreation" belt that would be exposed to weather and outdoor elements while hiking, backpacking, camping or trail restoration work. After researching other options, I decided to go with this product and try it out and it turns out that this belt is great! It's comfortable, snugly adjustable, lightweight and not bulky, even after having to cinch it through the buckle for an overlap fold-back of 5-6 inches (depending on the style cut of pants being worn). The slide release buckle is very secure and requires an adequate amount of pressure on both tabs to release it. Also, the buckle's low profile design contributes to its comfort and "flattering" appearance. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Skier's Essential: Elastic Belt Review
reviews.reviewText: As a skier, my husband recently tried out an elastic belt designed for outdoor activities, and it has become an essential part of his ski gear.The elastic material of this belt provides a snug and secure fit, which is crucial for skiers who want to keep their pants or snowsuit in place while navigating the slopes. The belt is easily adjustable, accommodating various waist sizes and layering options for different weather conditions. The elastic material is sturdy and able to withstand the wear and tear of skiing, including exposure to cold temperatures and moisture. This belt offers a comfortable and unobtrusive wearing experience, ensuring it doesn't hinder your movements while skiing. Elastic belts may have a more utilitarian look, which might not be as fashion-forward as some skiers prefer.The elastic belt designed for skiers is a valuable addition to your skiing gear. It offers a secure fit, adjustability, and durability, ensuring that your ski pants stay in place during your adventures. While it may not be the most stylish accessory, its functionality and comfort make it a worthwhile investment for skiers looking for practical solutions to keep their gear secure and comfortable on the slopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made very well
reviews.reviewText: Fits great light weight ands looks good. They have different colors to choose from. I purchased a black one last year and I liked it so much I just purchased two more a brown one and green one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly A Fantastic Alternative to a traditional belt
reviews.reviewText: This belt is not just a belt but a game-changer for adventure seekers and travel enthusiasts alike. Its robust construction from high-grade, water-resistant nylon weave ensures durability, making it the go-to belt for strenuous outdoor activities, yet it’s stylish enough to replace a traditional leather belt for day-to-day use. The belt’s quick-release buckle is a standout feature, offering an easy and efficient way to fasten or unfasten the belt—a real boon in challenging environments, whether you’re trekking through a forest or navigating a busy airport. Beyond its functional benefits, the belt offers a level of comfort that stands out, thanks to its adjustable sizing and ergonomic design. It effortlessly maintains its shape and tension whether you're rock climbing or simply walking through a city during your travels. While the price point may be a bit higher than traditional belts, the rcade Original Unisex Adventure Belt makes up for it by being a multifaceted, reliable investment that addresses both functional needs and stylistic desires. In summary, whether you're embarking on an outdoor adventure or need a versatile, dependable belt for travel and everyday wear, this belt comes highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These belts are extra nice because the buckle lays so flat. Very adjustable so it's always comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome belt for slimmer wasted people
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a lightweight flexible belt I could wear while hiking, rock climbing, kayaking, etc... and found mention of this brand in an online forum.Let me just say this belt checks all of my boxes and then some. I'm able to adjust it to just the right tension so it holds securely but will flex when I sit/bend down or move. The plastic buckle lays flat when I sit or stand and doesn't poke me or create friction when wearing a pack with a hip belt. I personally don't mind the plastic buckle as I don't think it necessarily means lowered durability and is less clunky than metal. The belt is pretty easy to adjust and I was able to get it to my liking in under 5 min. Durability remains to be seen but for 30 dollars it's not a major investment.The major downside of this belt is it's sizing. I have a 32" waist and only have about 3inches of slack left. I think if you have a larger waste the belt would need to be constantly flexed in order to accommodate you. Personally I think that would be uncomfortable. I like being able to have the belt just taught enough that it isn't "stretching" but can flex if need be during movement. This may just be a personal preference but I felt with pointing out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like these belts, I have two of them. They are very easy to adjust and super comfortable. I like that they are made from recycled plastic and that they are (almost) bullet proof. It’s cool that they don’t set off metal detectors although I suppose, technically, they should be removed at airports.

E' la seconda Arcade che prendo, prima la usavo solo per escursionismo e gite in montagna, perchè è elastica e non mi lascia segni e tagli ai fianchi, ora la sto usando anche al lavoro per gli stessi motivi. In più quando è sudata la metto in lavatrice con i pantaloni e torna come nuova. Consigliata.

Der Gürtel ist sehr bequem und stabil. Es ist vielleicht etwas zu lang, lässt sich aber problemlos einstellen. Wenn unbedingt etwas kritisieren muss, dann vielleicht, dass die Gürtelschnalle sehr leicht aus der Gürtelschlaufe vorne rutsscht
